questions.question: Which of the following are principles of the Zero Trust model?

The shared responsibility model identifies which security tasks are handled by the cloud provider, and which are handled by the customer. Which approach places more responsibility on the cloud provider?
In the shared responsibility model, in which approach does the customer own the security tasks related to information and data, devices, and accounts and identities?
options: Infrastructure as a service (IaaS) and platform as a service (PaaS)

questions.question: The HTTPS protocol is an example of which type of encryption?
What is the term used to describe the process for verifying the identity of an object, service, or person?
Which type of Microsoft Entra ID setup is most likely for personal devices used by employees to connect to the organization’s resources?
options: As Microsoft Entra hybrid joined devices
They will not be visible to the organization’s Microsoft Entra ID implementation

questions.question: Which of the following verification methods can be used with Microsoft Entra multifactor authentication?
Self-service password reset (SSPR) works in which of the following scenarios?
Which of the following are signals that can be used by Conditional Access?
How does Privileged Identity Management (PIM) mitigate the risks of excessive, unnecessary, or misused access permissions to Azure resources and Microsoft Entra?
An attacker can bring down your website by sending a large volume of network traffic to your servers. Which Azure service can help protect from this kind of attack?
Which features fall under the pillar of Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM)?

Which Azure security solution provides cloud workload protection plans that can be enabled separately and will run simultaneously to provide a comprehensive defense for compute data and service layers in your environment?
Which capability of Microsoft Sentinel can help automate and orchestrate your response to incidents and common security tasks?
Which of the Microsoft Defender XDR services safeguards your organization against malicious threats posed by email messages, links (URLs), and collaboration tools?
Which Priva solution can help limit data overexposure, find and limit data transfers, and minimize stored data?
What do sensitive information types use to classify data?
options: Patterns defined by a regular expression (regex) or a function

questions.question: Audit (Premium) supports the long-term retention of audit logs for up to how many years?
Which Microsoft Purview solution can help minimize risk associated with confidentiality violations, intellectual property theft, and regulatory compliance violations?
What capability can prevent users from accidentally sharing sensitive information in a Microsoft Teams chat session?
options: Apply a sensitivity label to the chat
